name: T90 Tank Battle Simulator in VR
name_original: T90 Tank Battle Simulator in VR
description:
Game features
Exciting and intense game time to immerse you in the battle

From deserts, hills to cities, we provide you with three different maps to help you experience different battles

More suitable for VR-friendly operation, allowing you to operate tank movement and aiming more accurately

Reasonably plan the loading time between different ammunition, while avoiding the enemy's attack, give them the greatest blow.


The ammunition has been loaded; let’s launch a bombardment on the enemy tank.

End the battle with your victory!


Instructions:
Use the trigger button on the right controller to fire;
Use the trigger button on the left controller to change weapons; the touchpad for movement; and the menu button to call out the menu.
